" Don Kirshner gave new, young musicians the opportunity to showcase their performances for a huge audience during the` golden age' of the popular music business," Billy Joel said in a statement. At the time, his` hands-off' approach to how rock and roll music was presented made television a viable medium for many now-iconic recording artists. Paul Shaffer , David Letterman 's musical director, used to give a deadpan performance during his imitation of Don Kirshner on Saturday Night Live. Paul Shaffer and Don Kirshner worked together on the short-lived sitcom, A Year at the Top
